title: Oracle

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a living player to add to your Bond.
- Once per game, at night instead add three players to your Bond.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are notified each time a Bonded player visits another Bonded player, but not their name.
- After death, you can choose a player in your Bond to learn the faction of. You are unaffected by frames.
- While dead, you can still cast votes during the day. You can't change your vote once placed. You may only do this three times.

desc:
Post 1445
"*The sticks are moving on their own! Ah - whose name is that?*"
